mapper.select: select ra.*, ca.id ca_id, ca.address_name ca_address_name, ca.name ca_name, ca.phone ca_phone, ca.province ca_province, ca.city ca_city, ca.region ca_region, ca.detail_address ca_detail_address from oms_order_return_apply ra LEFT JOIN oms_company_address ca ON ra.company_address_id = ca.id WHERE ra.id = #{id}
